subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: The veteran American rider Christopher Horner took the overall lead of the Vuelta a España in a mountainous 19th stage won by Joaquim Rodríguez on Friday.
snippet: The veteran American rider Christopher Horner took the overall lead of the Vuelta a España in a mountainous 19th stage won by Joaquim Rodríguez on Friday.
